proc_data.comment: proc_data - STRING - The full path to the reduction directory.

back_var.comment: back_var - STRING - Switch for a spatially variable differential background (gradient = YES : constant = NO : Default Value = constant).

coeff2.comment: coeff2 - DOUBLE -|- Coefficients a1 and a2 in the linearisation equation: Xnew = X + a1*X^2 + a2*X^3

coeff3.comment: coeff3 - DOUBLE -|  where X represents the image counts after bias level and bias pattern correction.

cppcode.comment: cppcode - STRING - The full directory path indicating where the DanIDL C++ code is installed.

det_thresh.comment: det_thresh - DOUBLE - Detection threshold used to detect stars in units of image sky sigma. This parameter should be positive (Default value = 3.0).

diffpro.comment: diffpro - INT - Switch for the method of difference image creation (see subtract routine : Default Value = 0).

expfrac.comment: expfrac - DOUBLE - Fraction of the exposure time to be added to the universal time at the start of the observation when calculating the GJD and HJD of the observation (Default value = 0.5).

flim.comment: flim - DOUBLE - Minimum contrast between the Laplacian image and the fine structure image. This parameter should be positive (Default value = 2.0).

grow.comment: grow - DOUBLE - Controls the amount of overlap between the image regions used for the kernel solutions (Default value = 0.0).

growsatx.comment: growsatx - INT - Half box size in the x direction (pix) to be used for growing saturated bad pixels in the bad pixel mask for each science image. This parameter should be non-negative (Default value = 0).

growsaty.comment: growsaty - INT - Half box size in the y direction (pix) to be used for growing saturated bad pixels in the bad pixel mask for each science image. This parameter should be non-negative (Default value = 0).

icdeg.comment: icdeg - INT - Degree of the 2D polynomial in spatial coordinates used to model non-uniform illumination in the flat frames. This parameter should be non-negative (Default value = 0).

init_mthresh.comment: init_mthresh - DOUBLE - Initial distance threshold (pix) to reject false star matches. This parameter should be positive (Default value = 1.0).

ker_rad.comment: ker_rad - DOUBLE - Radius of the kernel pixel array in units of image FWHM (Default value = 2.0).

lres_ker_rad.comment: lres_ker_rad - DOUBLE - Threshold radius of the kernel pixel array, in units of image FWHM, beyond which kernel pixels are of lower resolution (Default value = 2.0).

max_nimages.comment: max_nimages - INT - Maximum number of images to be used in the combined reference image (Default value = 1).

max_scale.comment: max_scale - DOUBLE - Maximum possible transformation scale factor (magnification) between any two images (Default value = -1.0).

max_sky.comment: max_sky - DOUBLE - Largest acceptable value of the sky background for an image to be used in the combined reference image (ADU : Default value = 5000).

mbiasmethod.comment: mbiasmethod - STRING - Method for combining the bias frames (mean = Mean : median = Median : sigclip = Sigma-clipped mean : Default value = sigclip).

mbiaspro.comment: mbiaspro - INT - Switch for master bias frame correction (0 = NO : 1 = YES : Default value = 0).

mbiassigma.comment: mbiassigma - DOUBLE - Sigma-clip threshold to be used if mbiasmethod is set to sigclip (Default value = -1.0).

mdarkmethod.comment: mdarkmethod - STRING - Method for combining the dark frames (mean = Mean : median = Median : sigclip = Sigma-clipped mean : Default value = sigclip).

mdarkpro.comment: mdarkpro - INT - Switch for master dark frame correction (0 = NO : 1 = YES : Default value = 0).

mdarksigma.comment: mdarksigma - DOUBLE - Sigma-clip threshold to be used if mdarkmethod is set to sigclip (Default value = -1.0).

mflatmethod.comment: mflatmethod - STRING - Method for combining the flat frames (mean = Mean : median = Median : sigclip = Sigma-clipped mean : Default value = median).

mflatpro.comment: mflatpro - INT - Switch for master flat frame correction (0 = NO : 1 = YES : Default value = 0).

mflatsigma.comment: mflatsigma - DOUBLE - Sigma-clip threshold to be used if oscanmethod is set to sigclip (Default value = -1.0).

min_ell.comment: min_ell - DOUBLE - Smallest acceptable value of the PSF ellipticity for an image to be used in the combined reference image. This parameter should be non-negative and less than or equal to 1.0 (Default value = 0.8).

min_scale.comment: min_scale - DOUBLE - Minimum possible transformation scale factor (magnification) between any two images (Default value = -1.0).

niter_cos.comment: niter_cos - INT - Maximum number of iterations to perform. This parameter should be positive (Default value = 4).

niter_ker.comment: niter_ker - INT - Maximum number of iterations to perform when determining the kernel solution (Default value = 3),

oscanauto.comment: oscanauto - INT - Switch for automatic polynomial model degree determination when calculating a vector overscan correction (oscanpro set to 3 or 4) (0 = Pre-defined degree : 1 = Automatic degree : Default value = 0).

oscandeg.comment: oscandeg - INT - Degree (or maximum degree) of the polynomial model to be fitted to the overscan region as a function of the image row/column (oscanpro set to 3 or 4). This parameter should be non-negative (Default value = 0).

oscanpro.comment: oscanpro - INT - Switch for bias level correction (0 = No bias level correction : 1 = Single constant bias level correction : 2 = Per-image constant overscan correction : 3 = Vector overscan correction per image row : 4 = Vector overscan correction per image column : Default value = 0).

ps_var.comment: ps_var - INT - Switch for a spatially variable photometric scale factor (1 = YES : 0 = NO : Default Value = 0).

psf_range_thresh.comment: psf_range_thresh - DOUBLE - The percentage of stars at the top and bottom of the brightness scale of those detected in the reference image, to be excluded from selection as PSF stars (Default value=10.0%).

psf_comp_dist.comment: psf_comp_dist - DOUBLE - Any star within a distance 0.5*psf_comp_dist*psf_size, in units of FWHM, of another star is considered to be a companion of that star for PSF star selection purposes. This parameter should be non-negative (Default value = 0.7).

psf_comp_flux.comment: psf_comp_flux - DOUBLE - Maximum flux ratio that any companion star may have for a star to be considered a PSF star. This parameter should be non-negative (Default value = 0.1).

psf_corr_thresh.comment: psf_corr_thresh - DOUBLE - Minimum correlation coefficient of a star with the image PSF model in order to be considered a PSF star. This parameter should be non-negative (Default value = 0.9).

psf_size.comment: psf_size - DOUBLE - Size of the model PSF stamp in units of FWHM. This parameter should be positive (Default value = 8.0).

psf_thresh.comment: psf_thresh - DOUBLE - Detection threshold used to detect candidate PSF stars in units of image sky sigma. This parameter should be positive (Default value = 10.0).

replace_cr.comment: replace_cr - INT - Switch for replacing pixel values that have been contaminated by cosmic ray events (0 = NO : 1 = YES : Default value = 0).

sigclip.comment: sigclip - DOUBLE - Threshold in units of sigma for cosmic ray detection on the Laplacian image. This parameter should be positive (Default value = 4.5).

sigfrac.comment: sigfrac - DOUBLE - Fraction of sigclip to be used as a threshold for cosmic ray growth. This parameter should be positive (Default value = 0.5).

smooth_fwhm.comment: smooth_fwhm - DOUBLE - Amount of image smoothing to perform (Default value = 0).

smooth_pro.comment: smooth_pro - INT - Switch for image smoothing [0: No smoothing, 1,2,3: Gaussian smoothing (see reference image documentation)] (Default value = 0).

star_space.comment: star_space - DOUBLE - Average spacing (pix) in each of the x and y coordinates between the stars to be considered for matching purposes. This parameter should be positive (Default value = 30.0).

subframes_x.comment: subframes_x - INT - Number of subdivisions in the x direction used in defining the grid of kernel solutions (Default value = 1).

subframes_y.comment: subframes_y - INT - Number of subdivisions in the y direction used in defining the grid of kernel solutions (Default value = 1).

trans_auto.comment: trans_auto - INT - Switch for automatic determination of the coordinate transformation type when fitting a coordinate transformation between two images (0 = Pre-defined transformation type : 1 = Automatic transformation type : Default value = 0).

trans_type.comment: trans_type - STRING - Type of coordinate transformation to fit when fitting a coordinate transformation between two images (shift = General pixel shift : rot_shift = Rotation and general pixel shift : rot_mag_shift = Rotation, magnification, and general pixel shift : linear = Linear : polynomial = Polynomial : Default value = linear).

use_reflist.comment: use_reflist - INT - Switch for using the images listed in the reference image combination list (0 = NO : 1 = YES : Default value = 0).

var_deg.comment: var_deg - INT - Polynomial degree of the spatial variation of the model used to represent the image PSF (0 = Constant : 1 = Linear : 2 = Quadratic : 3 = Cubic : Default value = 0).
